text:
Hi, I'm getting this error when I try to deploy an older project that has expired trials:
```[ERROR] Error while retrieving new access token: MISSING_HUB_PERMISSION.```
Are trials still necessary? If so, can someone please add those trials to my account?
<@UCY83QS6Q> I'll message you the acct no

Hey all,
I am releasing a change that optimizes how shared dependencies such as React are served and loaded for sites. It shouldn't have any affect on your sites, but if you see anything strange after your next deploy please let me know!

Thanks!
